inclusion.criterion: heart failure with ejection fraction greater than 35%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: commitment to go 3 times a week for RCV
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: rate >120 bpm (beats per minute) at rest
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and was diagnosed with Burkitt's lymphoma.
